title: Inheritance is About a Lot More Than Money
description: Families often achieve better outcomes by shifting the focus away from dollars, says Matt Wesley of Merrill Lynch's Center for Family Wealth, Dynamics and Governance.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Families often achieve better outcomes by shifting the focus away from dollars, says Matt Wesley of Merrill Lynch's Center for Family Wealth, Dynamics and Governance.
content:encoded: Families often achieve better outcomes by shifting the focus away from dollars, says Matt Wesley of Merrill Lynch's Center for Family Wealth, Dynamics and Governance.
